title: Trump says he'll cut tariffs on China after meeting with Xi Jinping
shortDescription: "We have not too many major stumbling blocks," Trump said of a formal trade agreement after meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping in South Korea.

title: Trump meets with Chinese President Xi
shortDescription: President Donald Trump caps off his five-day visit to Asia with a meeting with Chinese leader Xi Jinping in South Korea.

title: Trump says US will 'immediately' start testing nuclear weapons
shortDescription: Trump's announcement breaks with more than three decades of policy. The last time the United States tested a nuclear weapon was in 1992.

title: Virginia Democrats make their move in Trump-led redistricting wars
shortDescription: Virginia law requites both houses of the General Assembly to adopt a constitutional amendment again early next year before a plan can go to voters.

title: Colorado sues Trump admin over Space Command HQ move to Alabama
shortDescription: The lawsuit from Colorado's AG seeks an injunction against the move and a judge's order declaring President Trump's decision unconstitutional.

title: Feds indict Congressional candidate for ICE resistance in Chicago
shortDescription: Kat Abughazaleh, a Congressional candidate, has been charged in connection with anti-immigration enforcement protests in Chicago.

title: American, British protesters tie Donald Trump to Jeffrey Epstein
shortDescription: From Los Angeles to Scotland, protesters call for the release of FBI files related to Jeffrey Epstein.

title: House Republicans blame Zohran Mamdani for government shutdown
shortDescription: The democratic socialist state Assembly member has yet to win the mayor’s race, but GOP lawmakers in Washington, DC are already talking about him.

title: Will Democrats' decision to hold out for healthcare subsidies pay off?
shortDescription: Democrats are hoping voters reward them next November for protecting healthcare subsidies.

title: What to expect during Trump's high-stakes meeting with China's Xi
shortDescription: President Trump heads into a high-stakes meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping seeking to finalize a trade deal that eases tensions globally.

title: What is Trump's approval rating? Polls on No Kings, government shutdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is abroad, but the government has been shut down for four weeks. His approval rating remains low and steady. See latest polls.

title: GOP senator alleges fraudulent practices by wedding planning site
shortDescription: Iowa GOP Sen. Chuck Grassley is asking the Federal Trade Commission to investigate The Knot, a wedding planning site, alleging fraudulent practices

title: Trump denies third term run
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he’s not allowed to run for a third term, saying it's “too bad.”

title: Trump says ceasefire not at risk
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says the ceasefire deal is not at risk even after Israeli airstrikes hit Gaza, killing scores of people.

title: Trump says South Korea 'pretty much finalized' trade deal with US
shortDescription: Trump called a pending trade deal with South Korea 'pretty much finalized' after months of deadlock over details of investment in the US.

title: Trump given gold crown in South Korea
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was presented with a gold crown during his trip to South Korea.

title: Trump says it's 'pretty clear' he can't seek a third term
shortDescription: "I would say that if you read it, it’s pretty clear, I’m not allowed to run," Trump said about the possibility of third term. "It’s too bad."

title: Trump gets gold crown and South Korea’s highest honor
shortDescription: Trump was presented with a replica of an ancient gold crown as well as a medal representing the highest state honor during his visit to South Korea.

title: White House fires arts advisers as Trump's $300M ballroom plans whirl
shortDescription: The commission is charged with giving expert advice to the president, Congress and the heads of departments on matters of design and aesthetics.
